{{also|师叔}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=师叔}}

===Etymology===
A compound of {{m|zh|師||teacher}} and {{m|zh|叔||uncle younger than one's father}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=shī叔
|c=si1 suk1
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|martial arts}} The [[junior]] [[fellow]] [[students]] of the [[teacher]] in a [[Chinese]] [[martial arts]] [[school]].
